-- Step 1: Compute the average difference for locally funded schools
WITH AvgDifference AS (
    SELECT AVG(`Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`) AS avg_diff
    FROM frpm
    WHERE `FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
)

-- Step 2: Identify schools with above-average difference
SELECT 
    s.School, 
    s.DOCType
FROM 
    frpm f
INNER JOIN 
    schools s 
ON 
    f.CDSCode = s.CDSCode
WHERE 
    f.`FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
    AND (`Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`) > (SELECT avg_diff FROM AvgDifference);

-- Combine the first names from all three columns into a single column
WITH CombinedAdmins AS (
    SELECT AdmFName1 AS AdmFName, District
    FROM schools
    WHERE AdmFName1 IS NOT NULL
    UNION ALL
    SELECT AdmFName2 AS AdmFName, District
    FROM schools
    WHERE AdmFName2 IS NOT NULL
    UNION ALL
    SELECT AdmFName3 AS AdmFName, District
    FROM schools
    WHERE AdmFName3 IS NOT NULL
),
-- Count the frequency of each first name
AdminCounts AS (
    SELECT AdmFName, COUNT(*) AS NameCount
    FROM CombinedAdmins
    GROUP BY AdmFName
    ORDER BY NameCount DESC
    LIMIT 2
)
-- Join the top two first names back to the original data to get the districts
SELECT CA.AdmFName, CA.District
FROM CombinedAdmins CA
JOIN AdminCounts AC ON CA.AdmFName = AC.AdmFName;

SELECT 
    (T2.`Free Meal Count (K-12)` / T2.`Enrollment (K-12)`) * 100 AS PercentEligibleFreeK12,

-- SQL query to find account numbers of the oldest female client in the district with the lowest average salary
WITH OldestFemaleClient AS (
    SELECT 
        c.client_id, 
        c.district_id, 
        c.birth_date
    FROM 
        client c
    WHERE 
        c.gender = 'F'
    ORDER BY 
        c.birth_date ASC
    LIMIT 1
),
LowestSalaryDistrict AS (
    SELECT 
        d.district_id, 
        d.A11 AS lowest_salary
    FROM 
        district d
    ORDER BY 
        d.A11 ASC
    LIMIT 1
),
GapCalculation AS (
    SELECT 
        MAX(d.A11) - MIN(d.A11) AS salary_gap
    FROM 
        district d
)
SELECT 
    a.account_id,
    g.salary_gap
FROM 
    OldestFemaleClient o
INNER JOIN 
    LowestSalaryDistrict l ON o.district_id = l.district_id
INNER JOIN 
    account a ON o.district_id = a.district_id
CROSS JOIN 
    GapCalculation g;

SELECT T3.account_id
FROM client AS T1
INNER JOIN district AS T2 ON T1.district_id = T2.district_id
INNER JOIN disp AS T3 ON T1.client_id = T3.client_id

LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT disp.client_id) AS owner_count

-- SQL query to calculate the average number of single-bonded atoms in carcinogenic molecules
SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN b.bond_type = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT a.atom_id) AS average_single_bonded_atoms
FROM 
    molecule m
JOIN 
    bond b ON m.molecule_id = b.molecule_id
JOIN 
    connected c ON b.bond_id = c.bond_id
JOIN 
    atom a ON c.atom_id = a.atom_id OR c.atom_id2 = a.atom_id
WHERE 
    m.label = '+';

-- SQL query to calculate the percentage of carcinogenic molecules without fluorine
SELECT 
    CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT m.molecule_id) AS REAL) * 100 / 
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT molecule_id) 
     FROM molecule 
     WHERE label = '+') AS percentage_without_fluorine
FROM 
    molecule m
LEFT JOIN 
    atom a
ON 
    m.molecule_id = a.molecule_id
WHERE 
    m.label = '+'
    AND a.element != 'f'
    AND a.molecule_id IS NOT NULL;

-- SQL query to determine if the molecule with the most double bonds is carcinogenic
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN m.label = '+' THEN 'Yes' 
        ELSE 'No' 
    END AS is_carcinogenic
FROM 
    molecule m
JOIN 
    (SELECT 
         b.molecule_id, 
         COUNT(*) AS double_bond_count
     FROM 
         bond b
     WHERE 
         b.bond_type = '='
     GROUP BY 
         b.molecule_id
     ORDER BY 
         double_bond_count DESC
     LIMIT 1) AS max_double_bond_molecule
ON 
    m.molecule_id = max_double_bond_molecule.molecule_id;

-- SQL query to calculate the percentage of bonds with the most common combination of atoms' elements
WITH ElementCombinations AS (
    -- Get the element combinations for each bond
    SELECT
        b.bond_id,
        a1.element AS element1,
        a2.element AS element2
    FROM
        bond b
    JOIN
        connected c ON b.bond_id = c.bond_id
    JOIN
        atom a1 ON c.atom_id = a1.atom_id
    JOIN
        atom a2 ON c.atom_id2 = a2.atom_id
),
CombinationCounts AS (
    -- Count the number of bonds for each element combination
    SELECT
        element1,
        element2,
        COUNT(bond_id) AS bond_count
    FROM
        ElementCombinations
    GROUP BY
        element1, element2
),
MostCommonCombination AS (
    -- Find the most common combination
    SELECT
        element1,
        element2,
        bond_count
    FROM
        CombinationCounts
    ORDER BY
        bond_count DESC
    LIMIT 1
),
TotalBonds AS (
    -- Count the total number of bonds
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) AS total_bonds
    FROM
        bond
)
-- Calculate the percentage of bonds with the most common combination
SELECT
    (mcc.bond_count * 100.0) / tb.total_bonds AS percentage
FROM
    MostCommonCombination mcc
CROSS JOIN
    TotalBonds tb;

-- SQL query to count the number of unique elements in bond_id TR001_3_4

FROM (
    SELECT T3.element
    FROM bond AS T1
    INNER JOIN connected AS T2 ON T1.bond_id = T2.bond_id
    INNER JOIN atom AS T3 ON T2.atom_id = T3.atom_id
    WHERE T1.bond_id = 'TR001_3_4'
    UNION
    SELECT T3.element
    FROM bond AS T1
    INNER JOIN connected AS T2 ON T1.bond_id = T2.bond_id
    INNER JOIN atom AS T3 ON T2.atom_id2 = T3.atom_id
    WHERE T1.bond_id = 'TR001_3_4'
) AS unique_elements;

SELECT bond.bond_type

INNER JOIN bond ON connected.bond_id = bond.bond_id
WHERE connected.atom_id = 'TR000_1' AND connected.atom_id2 = 'TR000_2';

SELECT T2.molecule_id

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN label = '+' THEN 'Carcinogenic' 
        ELSE 'Non-Carcinogenic' 
    END AS classification
FROM molecule
WHERE molecule_id = 'TR000';

-- SQL query to calculate the percentage of atoms with single bonds
SELECT 
    (CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.bond_type = '-' THEN c.atom_id END) AS REAL) +
     CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.bond_type = '-' THEN c.atom_id2 END) AS REAL)) /
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT atom_id) FROM atom) * 100 AS percentage
FROM 
    connected c
LEFT JOIN 
    bond b
ON 
    c.bond_id = b.bond_id;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT molecule.molecule_id)
FROM molecule
INNER JOIN atom ON molecule.molecule_id = atom.molecule_id
WHERE molecule.label = '+' AND atom.element = 'n';

SELECT molecule_id
FROM atom
WHERE element = 's'
INTERSECT
SELECT molecule_id
FROM bond
WHERE bond_type = '=';

SELECT 
    molecule.molecule_id
FROM

INNER JOIN 
    atom
ON 
    molecule.molecule_id = atom.molecule_id
WHERE 
    molecule.label = '-'
GROUP BY 
    molecule.molecule_id
HAVING 
    COUNT(atom.atom_id) > 5;

SELECT DISTINCT a1.element
FROM bond b
INNER JOIN connected c ON b.bond_id = c.bond_id
INNER JOIN atom a1 ON c.atom_id = a1.atom_id
WHERE b.bond_type = '=' AND b.molecule_id = 'TR024'

UNION

SELECT DISTINCT a2.element
FROM bond b
INNER JOIN connected c ON b.bond_id = c.bond_id
INNER JOIN atom a2 ON c.atom_id2 = a2.atom_id
WHERE b.bond_type = '=' AND b.molecule_id = 'TR024';

SELECT 
    molecule.molecule_id
FROM

INNER JOIN

ON 
    molecule.molecule_id = atom.molecule_id
WHERE

GROUP BY 
    molecule.molecule_id
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(atom.molecule_id) DESC
LIMIT 1;

-- SQL query to calculate the percentage of carcinogenic molecules with triple bonded hydrogen atoms
SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN m.label = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT m.molecule_id) AS percentage
FROM 
    atom a
INNER JOIN 
    connected c ON a.atom_id = c.atom_id
INNER JOIN 
    bond b ON c.bond_id = b.bond_id
INNER JOIN 
    molecule m ON a.molecule_id = m.molecule_id
WHERE 
    a.element = 'h' AND b.bond_type = '#';

-- Step 1: Find the maximum convertedManaCost for cards in the "Coldsnap" set
WITH max_mana_cost AS (
    SELECT MAX(c.convertedManaCost) AS max_cost
    FROM sets s
    INNER JOIN cards c ON s.code = c.setCode
    WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap'
)

-- Step 2: Retrieve the Italian names of the cards with the maximum convertedManaCost
SELECT fd.name AS italian_name
FROM sets s
INNER JOIN cards c ON s.code = c.setCode
INNER JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid
WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap'
  AND fd.language = 'Italian'
  AND c.convertedManaCost = (SELECT max_cost FROM max_mana_cost);

-- Step 1: Find the play format with the highest number of banned cards
WITH banned_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        l.format, 
        COUNT(*) AS banned_count
    FROM 
        legalities l
    WHERE 
        l.status = 'Banned'
    GROUP BY 
        l.format
),
max_banned_format AS (
    SELECT 
        format
    FROM 
        banned_counts
    ORDER BY 
        banned_count DESC
    LIMIT 1
)

-- Step 2: Retrieve the names of all cards banned in the top format
SELECT 
    l.format, 
    c.name
FROM 
    legalities l
INNER JOIN 
    cards c 
ON 
    l.uuid = c.uuid
WHERE 
    l.status = 'Banned' 
    AND l.format = (SELECT format FROM max_banned_format);

-- Calculate the annual average number of sets released between 2012 and 2015
WITH yearly_set_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        STRFTIME('%Y', releaseDate) AS year,
        COUNT(*) AS set_count
    FROM sets
    WHERE releaseDate BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'
    GROUP BY year
),
average_set_count AS (
    SELECT 
        AVG(set_count) AS annual_average
    FROM yearly_set_counts
),
most_common_language AS (
    SELECT 
        language
    FROM foreign_data
    GROUP BY language
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
    annual_average,
    (SELECT language FROM most_common_language) AS common_language
FROM average_set_count;

WITH RECURSIVE TagSplit AS (
    -- Base case: Extract the first tag
    SELECT 
        p.Id AS PostId,
        SUBSTR(p.Tags, 2, INSTR(p.Tags, '>') - 2) AS Tag,
        SUBSTR(p.Tags, INSTR(p.Tags, '>') + 1) AS RemainingTags
    FROM 
        posts p
    INNER JOIN 
        users u ON p.OwnerUserId = u.Id
    WHERE 
        u.DisplayName = 'Mark Meckes' AND p.CommentCount = 0
    UNION ALL
    -- Recursive case: Extract subsequent tags
    SELECT 
        ts.PostId,
        SUBSTR(ts.RemainingTags, 2, INSTR(ts.RemainingTags, '>') - 2) AS Tag,
        SUBSTR(ts.RemainingTags, INSTR(ts.RemainingTags, '>') + 1) AS RemainingTags
    FROM 
        TagSplit ts
    WHERE 
        ts.RemainingTags <> ''
)
SELECT DISTINCT Tag
FROM TagSplit;

-- SQL query to calculate the percentage of superheroes with alignment = 'Bad'

    -- Calculate the percentage of superheroes with alignment = 'Bad'

    -- Count of superheroes with alignment = 'Bad' and published by Marvel Comics
    COUNT(CASE WHEN a.alignment = 'Bad' AND p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' THEN s.id ELSE NULL END) AS bad_alignment_marvel_count
FROM 
    superhero s
INNER JOIN 
    alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id
INNER JOIN 
    publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id;

FROM 
    results AS T1
JOIN 
    results AS T2

    T1.driverId = T2.driverId

ON 
    T1.driverId = D.driverId

    D.forename = 'Paul'

SELECT AVG(

    CAST(SUBSTR(fastestLapTime, INSTR(fastestLapTime, ':') + 1, INSTR(fastestLapTime, '.') - INSTR(fastestLapTime, ':') - 1) AS INTEGER) + 
    CAST(SUBSTR(fastestLapTime, INSTR(fastestLapTime, '.') + 1) AS REAL) / 1000
) AS average_fastest_lap_time_seconds
FROM results
INNER JOIN drivers ON results.driverId = drivers.driverId

WITH race_info AS (
    SELECT 
        r.raceId,
        r.name AS race_name,
        r.year
    FROM races r
    WHERE r.year = 2008 AND r.name = 'Australian Grand Prix'
),
champion_time AS (
    SELECT 
        MIN(results.time) AS champion_time
    FROM results
    INNER JOIN race_info ON results.raceId = race_info.raceId
    WHERE results.time IS NOT NULL
),
last_driver_time AS (
    SELECT 
        MAX(results.time) AS last_driver_time
    FROM results
    INNER JOIN race_info ON results.raceId = race_info.raceId
    WHERE results.time IS NOT NULL
),
time_difference AS (
    SELECT 
        champion_time.champion_time,
        last_driver_time.last_driver_time,
        (julianday(last_driver_time.last_driver_time) - julianday(champion_time.champion_time)) * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000 AS time_diff_ms
    FROM champion_time, last_driver_time
)
SELECT 
    (time_difference.time_diff_ms / CAST(julianday(last_driver_time.last_driver_time) * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000 AS REAL)) * 100 AS percentage_difference
FROM time_difference, last_driver_time;

-- SQL query to find the pit stop duration for the driver who set the lap record
SELECT ps.duration
FROM pitStops ps
JOIN races r ON ps.raceId = r.raceId
JOIN circuits c ON r.circuitId = c.circuitId
JOIN lapTimes lt ON ps.raceId = lt.raceId AND ps.driverId = lt.driverId
WHERE c.name = 'Austrian Grand Prix Circuit'
  AND lt.time = (
    SELECT MIN(lt2.time)
    FROM lapTimes lt2
    JOIN races r2 ON lt2.raceId = r2.raceId
    JOIN circuits c2 ON r2.circuitId = c2.circuitId
    WHERE c2.name = 'Austrian Grand Prix Circuit'
  );

SELECT AVG(lapTimes.milliseconds) AS average_lap_time
FROM lapTimes
INNER JOIN races ON lapTimes.raceId = races.raceId
INNER JOIN circuits ON races.circuitId = circuits.circuitId
WHERE circuits.country = 'Italy';

SELECT player_api_id
FROM Player_Attributes
ORDER BY overall_rating DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(id) 
FROM Player_Attributes 
WHERE overall_rating >= 60 
  AND overall_rating < 65 
  AND defensive_work_rate = 'low';

SELECT player_api_id
FROM Player_Attributes
ORDER BY crossing DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
    L.name
FROM 
    Match M
INNER JOIN 
    League L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
WHERE 
    M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY 
    L.id, L.name
ORDER BY 
    SUM(M.home_team_goal + M.away_team_goal) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    T.team_long_name
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    Team AS T
ON 
    M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
WHERE 
    M.season = '2015/2016' 
    AND M.home_team_goal - M.away_team_goal < 0
GROUP BY 
    M.home_team_api_id
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(*) ASC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT P.player_name
FROM Player AS P
INNER JOIN Player_Attributes AS PA
ON P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
ORDER BY PA.penalties DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    T.team_long_name
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    Team AS T
ON 
    M.away_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
INNER JOIN 
    League AS L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
WHERE 
    L.name = 'Scotland Premier League'
    AND M.season = '2009/2010'
    AND M.away_team_goal > M.home_team_goal
GROUP BY 
    M.away_team_api_id
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    T.team_long_name, 
    TA.buildUpPlaySpeed
FROM 
    Team AS T
INNER JOIN 
    Team_Attributes AS TA
ON 
    T.team_api_id = TA.team_api_id
ORDER BY 
    TA.buildUpPlaySpeed DESC
LIMIT 4;

SELECT 
    L.name
FROM 
    Match M
INNER JOIN 
    League L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
WHERE 
    M.home_team_goal = M.away_team_goal
    AND M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY 
    L.id
ORDER BY 
    COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    (JULIANDAY(DATETIME()) - JULIANDAY(P.birthday)) / 365.25 AS age
FROM 
    Player AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
WHERE 
    PA.sprint_speed >= 97
    AND CAST(STRFTIME('%Y', PA.date) AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 2013 AND 2015;

SELECT 
    L.name, 
    COUNT(*) AS match_count
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    League AS L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
GROUP BY 
    L.name
ORDER BY 
    match_count DESC
LIMIT 1;

-- SQL query to find players with the highest above-average overall ratings in 2010
SELECT player_api_id
FROM Player_Attributes
WHERE SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) = '2010'
  AND overall_rating > (
    SELECT AVG(overall_rating)
    FROM Player_Attributes
    WHERE SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) = '2010'
  )
  AND overall_rating = (
    SELECT MAX(overall_rating)
    FROM Player_Attributes
    WHERE SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) = '2010'
      AND overall_rating > (
        SELECT AVG(overall_rating)
        FROM Player_Attributes
        WHERE SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) = '2010'
      )
  );

SELECT 
    T.team_long_name
FROM 
    Team AS T
INNER JOIN 
    Team_Attributes AS TA
ON 
    T.team_api_id = TA.team_api_id
WHERE 
    strftime('%Y', TA.date) = '2012'
    AND TA.buildUpPlayPassing > (
        SELECT 
            AVG(buildUpPlayPassing)
        FROM 
            Team_Attributes
        WHERE 
            strftime('%Y', date) = '2012'
            AND buildUpPlayPassing IS NOT NULL
    );

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN PA.preferred_foot = 'left' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(P.player_api_id) AS percentage_left_foot
FROM 
    Player AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
WHERE 
    CAST(SUBSTR(P.birthday, 1, 4) AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1987 AND 1992;

SELECT 
    L.name AS league_name,
    SUM(M.home_team_goal + M.away_team_goal) AS total_goals
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    League AS L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
GROUP BY 
    L.name
ORDER BY 
    total_goals ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(T2.long_shots) AS REAL) / COUNT(T2.player_fifa_api_id) AS average_long_shots
FROM 
    Player AS T1
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS T2
ON 
    T1.player_fifa_api_id = T2.player_fifa_api_id
WHERE 
    T1.player_name = 'Ahmed Samir Farag';

SELECT

LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    T.team_long_name
FROM 
    Team AS T
INNER JOIN 
    Team_Attributes AS TA
ON 
    T.team_api_id = TA.team_api_id
WHERE 
    TA.buildUpPlayDribblingClass = 'Normal'
    AND TA.date >= '2014-01-01 00:00:00'
    AND TA.date <= '2014-12-31 23:59:59'
    AND TA.chanceCreationPassing < (
        SELECT AVG(chanceCreationPassing)
        FROM Team_Attributes
    )
ORDER BY 
    TA.chanceCreationPassing DESC;

SELECT

FROM 
    League AS L
INNER JOIN 
    Match AS M
ON 
    L.id = M.league_id
WHERE 
    M.season = '2009/2010'
GROUP BY 
    L.name
HAVING 
    SUM(M.home_team_goal) / COUNT(DISTINCT M.id) > SUM(M.away_team_goal) / COUNT(DISTINCT M.id);

SELECT 
    (SUM(CASE WHEN P.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN PA.ball_control ELSE 0 END) / 
     COUNT(CASE WHEN P.player_name = 'Abdou Diallo' THEN PA.id ELSE NULL END)) -
    (SUM(CASE WHEN P.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN PA.ball_control ELSE 0 END) / 
     COUNT(CASE WHEN P.player_name = 'Aaron Appindangoye' THEN PA.id ELSE NULL END)) AS difference
FROM 
    Player P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id;

SELECT 
    ((A.overall_rating - B.overall_rating) * 100.0 / B.overall_rating) AS percentage_difference
FROM 
    Player_Attributes A
INNER JOIN 
    Player P1 ON A.player_api_id = P1.player_api_id
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes B
INNER JOIN 
    Player P2 ON B.player_api_id = P2.player_api_id
WHERE 
    P1.player_name = 'Ariel Borysiuk' 
    AND P2.player_name = 'Paulin Puel';

SELECT SUM(M.home_team_goal) AS total_home_goals
FROM Player P

    M.home_player_1, M.home_player_2, M.home_player_3, M.home_player_4, M.home_player_5,

)
WHERE P.player_name = 'Aaron Lennon';

SELECT SUM(M.away_team_goal) AS total_away_goals
FROM Player P
JOIN Match M
ON P.player_api_id IN (
    M.away_player_1, M.away_player_2, M.away_player_3, M.away_player_4, M.away_player_5,
    M.away_player_6, M.away_player_7, M.away_player_8, M.away_player_9, M.away_player_10, M.away_player_11
)
WHERE P.player_name IN ('Daan Smith', 'Filipe Ferreira');

SELECT DISTINCT P.player_name
FROM Player P
JOIN Team T ON P.player_api_id IN (
    T.home_player_1, T.home_player_2, T.home_player_3, T.home_player_4, T.home_player_5,
    T.home_player_6, T.home_player_7, T.home_player_8, T.home_player_9, T.home_player_10, T.home_player_11,
    T.away_player_1, T.away_player_2, T.away_player_3, T.away_player_4, T.away_player_5,
    T.away_player_6, T.away_player_7, T.away_player_8, T.away_player_9, T.away_player_10, T.away_player_11
)
JOIN Match M ON T.team_api_id = M.home_team_api_id OR T.team_api_id = M.away_team_api_id
JOIN League L ON M.league_id = L.id
JOIN Country C ON L.country_id = C.id
WHERE C.name = 'Belgium';

SELECT DISTINCT C.name AS country_name
FROM Player_Attributes PA
INNER JOIN Player P ON PA.player_api_id = P.player_api_id
INNER JOIN Match M ON P.player_api_id IN (
    M.home_player_1, M.home_player_2, M.home_player_3, M.home_player_4, M.home_player_5,
    M.home_player_6, M.home_player_7, M.home_player_8, M.home_player_9, M.home_player_10, M.home_player_11,
    M.away_player_1, M.away_player_2, M.away_player_3, M.away_player_4, M.away_player_5,
    M.away_player_6, M.away_player_7, M.away_player_8, M.away_player_9, M.away_player_10, M.away_player_11
)
INNER JOIN Team T ON M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id OR M.away_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
INNER JOIN Country C ON T.country_id = C.id
WHERE PA.vision > 89;

SELECT 
    C.name AS country_name,
    AVG(P.weight) AS average_weight
FROM 
    Player AS P
JOIN 
    Match AS M
    ON P.player_api_id IN (
        M.home_player_1, M.home_player_2, M.home_player_3, M.home_player_4, M.home_player_5,
        M.home_player_6, M.home_player_7, M.home_player_8, M.home_player_9, M.home_player_10, M.home_player_11,
        M.away_player_1, M.away_player_2, M.away_player_3, M.away_player_4, M.away_player_5,
        M.away_player_6, M.away_player_7, M.away_player_8, M.away_player_9, M.away_player_10, M.away_player_11
    )
JOIN 
    Team AS T
    ON M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id OR M.away_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
JOIN 
    League AS L
    ON T.team_api_id = L.id
JOIN 
    Country AS C
    ON L.country_id = C.id
GROUP BY 
    C.name
ORDER BY 
    average_weight DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT T.team_long_name
FROM Team AS T
INNER JOIN Team_Attributes AS TA
ON T.team_api_id = TA.team_api_id
WHERE TA.buildUpPlaySpeedClass = 'Slow';

SELECT DISTINCT T.team_short_name
FROM Team AS T
INNER JOIN Team_Attributes AS TA ON T.team_api_id = TA.team_api_id
WHERE TA.chanceCreationPassingClass = 'Safe';

SELECT AVG(P.height) AS average_height
FROM Country C
INNER JOIN League L ON C.id = L.country_id
INNER JOIN Match M ON L.id = M.league_id
INNER JOIN Team T ON M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id OR M.away_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
INNER JOIN Player P ON T.team_api_id = P.player_api_id
WHERE C.name = 'Italy';

SELECT player_name
FROM Player
WHERE height > 180
ORDER BY player_name ASC
LIMIT 3;

SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM Player 
WHERE player_name LIKE 'Aaron%' 
  AND birthday > '1990';

SELECT player_api_id
FROM Player_Attributes
WHERE preferred_foot = 'right'
ORDER BY potential ASC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Player_Attributes
WHERE crossing = (SELECT MAX(crossing) FROM Player_Attributes)
  AND preferred_foot = 'left';

SELECT 
    (CAST(COUNT(*) AS REAL) * 100.0) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Player_Attributes) AS percentage
FROM 
    Player_Attributes
WHERE 
    strength > 80 AND stamina > 80;

SELECT Country.name
FROM League
INNER JOIN Country ON League.country_id = Country.id
WHERE League.name = 'Poland Ekstraklasa';

SELECT 
    M.home_team_goal, 
    M.away_team_goal
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    League AS L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
WHERE 
    M.date LIKE '2008-09-24%' 
    AND L.name = 'Belgium Jupiler League';

SELECT 
    PA.sprint_speed, 
    PA.agility, 
    PA.acceleration
FROM 
    Player AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
WHERE 
    P.player_name = 'Alexis Blin';

SELECT T2.buildUpPlaySpeedClass
FROM Team AS T1
INNER JOIN Team_Attributes AS T2
ON T1.team_api_id = T2.team_api_id
WHERE T1.team_long_name = 'KSV Cercle Brugge';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS game_count
FROM `Match` AS M
INNER JOIN League AS L ON M.league_id = L.id
WHERE M.season = '2015/2016' AND L.name = 'Italian Serie A';

SELECT MAX(M.home_team_goal) AS highest_home_team_goal
FROM `Match` AS M
INNER JOIN League AS L ON M.league_id = L.id
WHERE L.name = 'Netherlands Eredivisie';

SELECT 
    PA.finishing, 
    PA.curve
FROM 
    Player AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
WHERE 
    P.weight = (SELECT MAX(weight) FROM Player);

SELECT 
    L.name, 
    COUNT(M.id) AS match_count
FROM 
    Match AS M
INNER JOIN 
    League AS L
ON 
    M.league_id = L.id
WHERE 
    M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY 
    L.name
ORDER BY 
    match_count DESC
LIMIT 4;

SELECT T.team_long_name
FROM Team AS T
INNER JOIN Match AS M ON T.team_api_id = M.away_team_api_id
WHERE M.away_team_goal = (SELECT MAX(away_team_goal) FROM Match);

SELECT P.player_name
FROM Player AS P
INNER JOIN Player_Attributes AS PA ON P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id
ORDER BY PA.overall_rating DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN P.height < 180 AND PA.overall_rating > 70 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(P.id) AS percentage
FROM 
    Player AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Player_Attributes AS PA
ON 
    P.player_api_id = PA.player_api_id;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN Admission = '+' THEN ID END) > COUNT(CASE WHEN Admission = '-' THEN ID END) 
        THEN 'More in-patient' 
        ELSE 'More outpatient' 
    END AS Admission_Type,
    ABS(
        CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN Admission = '+' THEN ID END) AS REAL) - 
        COUNT(CASE WHEN Admission = '-' THEN ID END)
    ) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN Admission = '-' THEN ID END) AS Percentage_Deviation
FROM 
    Patient
WHERE 
    SEX = 'M';

SELECT 
    (CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN strftime('%Y', Birthday) > '1930' THEN ID ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100.0) / COUNT(ID) AS percentage
FROM 
    Patient
WHERE 
    SEX = 'F';

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN Admission = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS InpatientPercentage
FROM 
    Patient
WHERE 
    STRFTIME('%Y', Birthday) BETWEEN '1930' AND '1940';

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN Admission = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / 
    SUM(CASE WHEN Admission = '+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS OutpatientToInpatientRatio
FROM Patient
WHERE Diagnosis = 'SLE';

SELECT DISTINCT Patient.Diagnosis, Laboratory.Date
FROM Patient
INNER JOIN Laboratory ON Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE Patient.ID = 30609;

SELECT 
    Patient.SEX, 
    Patient.Birthday, 
    Examination.`Examination Date`, 
    Examination.Symptoms
FROM 
    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Examination 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Examination.ID

    Patient.ID = 163109;

SELECT

    Patient.SEX, 
    Patient.Birthday

    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE 
    Laboratory.LDH > 500;

SELECT 
    P.ID,

FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Examination AS E
ON 
    P.ID = E.ID

    E.RVVT = '+';

SELECT 
    Patient.ID, 
    Patient.SEX, 
    Patient.Diagnosis
FROM 
    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Examination 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Examination.ID

SELECT DISTINCT Patient.ID
FROM Patient
INNER JOIN Laboratory ON Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID

SELECT

WHERE 
    Laboratory.ALB < 3.5;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN L.TP < 6.0 OR L.TP > 8.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(P.ID) AS percentage
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID

FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Examination AS E ON P.ID = E.ID

  AND strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', P.Birthday) - (strftime('%m-%d', 'now') < strftime('%m-%d', P.Birthday)) >= 50;

SELECT COUNT(ID)

  AND Admission = '-' 
  AND SEX = 'F';

INNER JOIN Examination AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID
WHERE T2.Thrombosis = 1
  AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.`Examination Date`) = '1997'
  AND T1.SEX = 'F';

SELECT

FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID

INNER JOIN Examination AS E ON P.ID = E.ID
WHERE E.Symptoms IS NOT NULL

LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT T1.ID) AS REAL) / 12 AS AveragePatientsPerMonth
FROM

INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS T2
ON 
    T1.ID = T2.ID
WHERE 
    T1.SEX = 'M' 
    AND T2.Date BETWEEN '1998-01-01' AND '1998-12-31';

    L.Date AS Latest_Laboratory_Date,

FROM 
    Patient P
JOIN 
    Laboratory L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID

    P.Diagnosis = 'SJS'

LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN P.SEX = 'M' AND L.UA <= 8.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / 
    SUM(CASE WHEN P.SEX = 'F' AND L.UA <= 6.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ratio

    P.ID = L.ID;

FROM Patient AS T1
INNER JOIN Examination AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID

LIMIT 1;

FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID

INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L ON P.ID = L.ID

    L.HGB = (SELECT MAX(HGB) FROM Laboratory);

SELECT SEX

SELECT E.`aCL IgM`

SELECT Patient.Diagnosis

SELECT Examination.Symptoms
FROM Patient

SELECT 
    (SUM(CASE WHEN L.Date LIKE '1981-11-%' THEN L.`T-CHO` ELSE 0 END) - 
     SUM(CASE WHEN L.Date LIKE '1981-12-%' THEN L.`T-CHO` ELSE 0 END)) / 
    SUM(CASE WHEN L.Date LIKE '1981-11-%' THEN L.`T-CHO` ELSE 0 END) AS DecreaseRate
FROM 
    Patient P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L

    P.ID = L.ID

    P.Birthday = '1959-02-18';

SELECT DISTINCT P.ID
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Examination AS E ON P.ID = E.ID
WHERE LOWER(P.Diagnosis) = 'behcet'
  AND E.`Examination Date` BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1997-12-31';

SELECT ID
FROM Laboratory
WHERE Date BETWEEN '1987-07-06' AND '1996-01-31'
  AND GPT > 30
  AND ALB < 4
GROUP BY ID
ORDER BY ID;

-- Count the number of female patients born in 1964 and admitted to the hospital

FROM Patient
WHERE SEX = 'F'
  AND strftime('%Y', Birthday) = '1964'
  AND Admission = '+'

UNION ALL

SELECT ID

  AND Admission = '+';

SELECT COUNT(ID)

  AND `ANA Pattern` = 'S' 
  AND `aCL IgM` > (SELECT AVG(`aCL IgM`) FROM Examination) * 1.2;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN UA <= 6.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS percentage
FROM 
    Laboratory
WHERE 
    `U-PRO` > 0 AND `U-PRO` < 30;

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN Diagnosis = 'BEHCET' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS Percentage
FROM 
    Patient
WHERE 
    SEX = 'M' 
    AND strftime('%Y', `First Date`) = '1981';

SELECT DISTINCT P.ID
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE P.Admission = '-'
  AND L.Date LIKE '1991-10%'
  AND L.`T-BIL` < 2.0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.ID) AS WomanCount

WHERE P.SEX = 'F'
  AND P.Birthday BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1989-12-31'

SELECT P.SEX
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Examination AS E ON P.ID = E.ID
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID

  AND L.CRP = '2+'

SELECT AVG(L.ALB) AS Average_Albumin_Level
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE P.SEX = 'F'
  AND L.PLT > 400
  AND P.Diagnosis = 'SLE';

SELECT E.Symptoms
FROM Patient P
INNER JOIN Examination E ON P.ID = E.ID
WHERE P.Diagnosis = 'SLE'
GROUP BY E.Symptoms
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(ID) 
FROM Laboratory 
WHERE STRFTIME('%Y', Date) = '1997' 
  AND (TP <= 6 OR TP >= 8.5);

SELECT 
    (CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN P.Diagnosis = 'SLE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0) / COUNT(*) AS proportion
FROM 
    Examination E
INNER JOIN 
    Patient P
ON 
    E.ID = P.ID
WHERE 
    E.Symptoms = 'thrombocytopenia';

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN SEX = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS Percentage
FROM 
    Patient
WHERE 
    STRFTIME('%Y', Birthday) = '1980' 
    AND Diagnosis = 'RA';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.ID)

  AND E.`Examination Date` BETWEEN '1995-01-01' AND '1997-12-31'
  AND E.Diagnosis = 'Behcet'
  AND P.Admission = '-';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Patient.ID) AS FemalePatientsWithLowWBC
FROM Patient
INNER JOIN Laboratory ON Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE Patient.SEX = 'F' AND Laboratory.WBC < 3.5;

SELECT julianday(T2.`Examination Date`) - julianday(T1.`First Date`) AS DaysDifference
FROM Patient AS T1
INNER JOIN Examination AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID
WHERE T1.ID = 821298;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN (T1.SEX = 'M' AND T2.UA > 8.0) OR (T1.SEX = 'F' AND T2.UA > 6.5) THEN 'Yes'
        ELSE 'No'
    END AS Is_UA_Normal
FROM 
    Patient AS T1
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS T2
ON 
    T1.ID = T2.ID
WHERE 
    T1.ID = 57266;

SELECT 
    P.SEX, 
    P.Birthday
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.GOT < 60 
    AND STRFTIME('%Y', L.Date) = '1994';

SELECT DISTINCT Patient.ID
FROM Patient
INNER JOIN Laboratory ON Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE Patient.SEX = 'M' AND Laboratory.GPT >= 60;

SELECT Patient.Diagnosis
FROM Laboratory
INNER JOIN Patient ON Laboratory.ID = Patient.ID
WHERE Laboratory.GPT > 60
ORDER BY Patient.Birthday ASC;

SELECT 
    P.ID, 
    strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', P.Birthday) AS age
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.LDH BETWEEN 600 AND 800;

SELECT DISTINCT P.Admission
FROM Laboratory AS L
INNER JOIN Patient AS P ON L.ID = P.ID
WHERE L.ALP < 300;

SELECT 
    P.ID, 
    CASE 
        WHEN L.ALP < 300 THEN 'Within Normal Range' 
        ELSE 'Outside Normal Range' 
    END AS ALP_Status
FROM 
    Patient P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    P.Birthday = '1982-04-01';

SELECT 
    Patient.ID, 
    Patient.SEX, 
    Patient.Birthday
FROM 
    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE 
    Laboratory.TP < 6.0;

SELECT L.TP - 8.5 AS Deviation
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE P.SEX = 'F' AND L.TP > 8.5;

SELECT 
    T1.ID, 
    T1.Birthday 
FROM 
    Patient AS T1 
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS T2 
ON 
    T1.ID = T2.ID 
WHERE 
    T1.SEX = 'M' 
    AND (T2.ALB < 3.5 OR T2.ALB > 5.5) 
ORDER BY 
    T1.Birthday DESC;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN L.ALB BETWEEN 3.5 AND 5.5 THEN 'Within Range' 
        ELSE 'Out of Range' 
    END AS AlbuminStatus
FROM 
    Patient P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    strftime('%Y', P.Birthday) = '1982';

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN L.UA > 6.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(P.ID) AS Percentage
FROM 
    Patient P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    P.SEX = 'F';

SELECT AVG(L.UA) AS Average_UA
FROM Patient P
INNER JOIN Laboratory L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE L.Date = (
    SELECT MAX(Date)
    FROM Laboratory
    WHERE ID = P.ID
)
AND (
    (P.SEX = 'M' AND L.UA < 8.0) OR
    (P.SEX = 'F' AND L.UA < 6.5)
);

SELECT 
    Patient.ID, 
    Patient.SEX, 
    Patient.Birthday
FROM 
    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE 
    Laboratory.UN = 29;

SELECT DISTINCT P.ID, P.SEX, P.Birthday
FROM Patient P
INNER JOIN Laboratory L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE P.Diagnosis = 'RA' AND L.UN < 30;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.ID) AS MalePatientCount
FROM Patient AS P
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS L ON P.ID = L.ID
WHERE P.SEX = 'M' AND L.CRE >= 1.5;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN P.SEX = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > SUM(CASE WHEN P.SEX = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 
        THEN 'True' 
        ELSE 'False' 
    END AS result
FROM 
    Patient P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.CRE >= 1.5;

SELECT 
    P.ID, 
    P.SEX, 
    P.Birthday
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.`T-BIL` = (SELECT MAX(`T-BIL`) FROM Laboratory);

SELECT 
    P.SEX, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT P.ID) AS PatientList
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.`T-BIL` >= 2.0
GROUP BY 
    P.SEX;

SELECT P.ID, L.`T-CHO`
FROM Patient P
INNER JOIN Laboratory L ON P.ID = L.ID
ORDER BY P.Birthday ASC, L.`T-CHO` DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    AVG(strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', P.Birthday)) AS average_age
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    P.SEX = 'M' 
    AND L.`T-CHO` >= 250;

SELECT 
    Patient.ID, 
    Patient.Diagnosis
FROM 
    Patient
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory 
ON 
    Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE 
    Laboratory.TG > 300;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.ID) AS PatientCount
FROM Laboratory AS T1
INNER JOIN Patient AS T2 ON T1.ID = T2.ID
WHERE T1.TG >= 200
  AND (strftime('%Y', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - strftime('%Y', T2.Birthday)) > 50;

SELECT DISTINCT Patient.ID
FROM Patient
INNER JOIN Laboratory ON Patient.ID = Laboratory.ID
WHERE Patient.Admission = '-' AND Laboratory.CPK < 250;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.ID) 
FROM Patient AS T1 
INNER JOIN Laboratory AS T2

WHERE T1.SEX = 'M' 
  AND T1.Birthday BETWEEN '1936-01-01' AND '1956-12-31' 
  AND T2.CPK >= 250;

SELECT 
    P.ID, 
    P.SEX, 
    strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', P.Birthday) AS age
FROM 
    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.GLU >= 180 
    AND L.`T-CHO` < 250;

    Laboratory AS L

    AND L.GLU < 180;

    Laboratory AS L
ON 
    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE 
    L.WBC <= 3.5 OR L.WBC >= 9.0
GROUP BY 
    P.SEX
ORDER BY 
    (strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', P.Birthday)) ASC;

SELECT 
    P.ID,

    Patient AS P
INNER JOIN 
    Laboratory AS L

    P.ID = L.ID
WHERE

-- SQL query to find the event with the highest attendance
SELECT e.event_name
FROM event e
JOIN (
    SELECT link_to_event, COUNT(link_to_member) AS attendance_count
    FROM attendance
    GROUP BY link_to_event
    ORDER BY attendance_count DESC
    LIMIT 1
) a ON e.event_id = a.link_to_event;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS meeting_count
FROM (
    SELECT T1.event_id
    FROM event AS T1
    INNER JOIN attendance AS T2
    ON T1.event_id = T2.link_to_event
    WHERE T1.type = 'Meeting'
    GROUP BY T1.event_id
    HAVING COUNT(T2.link_to_member) > 10
) AS subquery;

-- SQL query to list event names with attendance > 20 and not fundraisers
SELECT e.event_name
FROM event e
JOIN attendance a ON e.event_id = a.link_to_event
GROUP BY e.event_id
HAVING COUNT(a.link_to_member) > 20
AND e.event_id NOT IN (
    SELECT b.link_to_event
    FROM budget b
    JOIN income i ON b.budget_id = i.link_to_member
    WHERE i.source = 'Fundraising'
);

SELECT 
    CAST(SUM(attendance) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT event.event_id) AS average_attendance
FROM (
    SELECT 
        attendance.link_to_event, 
        COUNT(*) AS attendance
    FROM 
        attendance
    INNER JOIN 
        event 
    ON 
        attendance.link_to_event = event.event_id
    WHERE 
        STRFTIME('%Y', event.event_date) = '2020' 
        AND event.type = 'Meeting'
    GROUP BY 
        attendance.link_to_event
) AS meeting_attendance
INNER JOIN 
    event 
ON 
    meeting_attendance.link_to_event = event.event_id;

WHERE 
    b.category = 'Parking'
GROUP BY 
    e.event_name
HAVING 
    SUM(exp.cost) < (
        SELECT 
            AVG(total_cost)
        FROM (
            SELECT 
                b.link_to_event, 
                SUM(exp.cost) AS total_cost
            FROM 
                expense AS exp
            INNER JOIN 
                budget AS b ON exp.link_to_budget = b.budget_id

                b.link_to_event

WITH FilteredData AS (
    SELECT 
        c.Segment,
        y.Consumption
    FROM 
        customers c
    INNER JOIN 
        yearmonth y
    ON 
        c.CustomerID = y.CustomerID
    WHERE 
        c.Currency = 'CZK' 
        AND y.Date BETWEEN '201301' AND '201312'
),
LowestConsumption AS (
    SELECT 
        Segment,
        MIN(Consumption) AS MinConsumption
    FROM 
        FilteredData
    GROUP BY 
        Segment
),
LowestConsumptionCustomers AS (
    SELECT 
        f.Segment,
        COUNT(*) AS NumLowestConsumptionCustomers
    FROM 
        FilteredData f
    INNER JOIN 
        LowestConsumption l
    ON 
        f.Segment = l.Segment AND f.Consumption = l.MinConsumption
    GROUP BY 
        f.Segment
),
TotalConsumption AS (
    SELECT 
        Segment,
        SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption
    FROM 
        FilteredData
    GROUP BY 
        Segment
),
AnnualAverage AS (
    SELECT 
        t.Segment,
        t.TotalConsumption / l.NumLowestConsumptionCustomers AS AnnualAverage
    FROM 
        TotalConsumption t
    INNER JOIN 
        LowestConsumptionCustomers l
    ON 
        t.Segment = l.Segment
)
SELECT 
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'SME') - 
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'LAM') AS SME_LAM_Difference,
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'LAM') - 
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'KAM') AS LAM_KAM_Difference,
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'KAM') - 
    (SELECT AnnualAverage FROM AnnualAverage WHERE Segment = 'SME') AS KAM_SME_Difference;

WITH SegmentConsumption AS (
    SELECT 
        c.Segment,
        SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(y.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN y.Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS Consumption_2012,
        SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(y.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' THEN y.Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS Consumption_2013
    FROM 
        customers c
    INNER JOIN 
        yearmonth y
    ON 
        c.CustomerID = y.CustomerID
    WHERE 
        c.Currency = 'EUR'
    GROUP BY 
        c.Segment
),
PercentageIncrease AS (
    SELECT 
        Segment,
        CASE 
            WHEN Consumption_2013 = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE ((Consumption_2013 - Consumption_2012) * 100.0 / Consumption_2013)
        END AS PercentageIncrease
    FROM 
        SegmentConsumption
)
SELECT 
    Segment,
    PercentageIncrease
FROM 
    PercentageIncrease
ORDER BY 
    PercentageIncrease DESC
LIMIT 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Segment,
    PercentageIncrease
FROM 
    PercentageIncrease
ORDER BY 
    PercentageIncrease ASC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT

FROM 
    transactions_1k AS T1
INNER JOIN 
    yearmonth AS T2012 
    ON T1.CustomerID = T2012.CustomerID AND T2012.Date = '2012'
INNER JOIN 
    yearmonth AS T2013
